mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOODS_TBL( GDS_CODE, CATE_CODE, CATE_CODE_PRT, GDS_NM, GDS_CN, GDS_IMG, GDS_IMG_FOLDER, GDS_PRICE, GDS_DSCNT, GDS_CNT, GDS_PRCHS_YN )VALUES( pk_gds_code.nextval, #{cate_code}, #{cate_code_prt}, #{gds_nm}, #{gds_cn}, #{gds_img}, #{gds_img_folder}, #{gds_price}, #{gds_dscnt}, #{gds_cnt}, #{gds_prchs_yn} )
